must_attend.name: The AI Summit New York 2025
must_attend.tagline: Enterprise AI insights, workshops, live demos & networking for AI pros and investors
must_attend.why_relevant: Strong focus on AI with enterprise applications, large scale, premium pricing, numerous investors and professionals networking, excellent ROI potential.

must_attend.name: Future of AI 2025 by Financial Times Live
must_attend.tagline: Future impact of AI across sectors with senior professionals and investors
must_attend.why_relevant: Focus on AI future with strong investor presence and senior professionals, excellent for networking and insight into strategic trends.

must_attend.name: Gartner Marketing Symposium/Xpo
must_attend.tagline: Premier marketing event for strategic insights and networking with marketing executives
must_attend.why_relevant: High profile marketing symposium, great for investors interested in marketing tech and trends, large networking opportunities, premium cost, high ROI.

must_attend.name: Forty-Second International Conference on Machine Learning (ICML 2025)
must_attend.tagline: Premier global conference on machine learning research, innovation, and networking
must_attend.why_relevant: Top machine learning conference attracting global researchers and industry leaders, strong networking for investors targeting ML innovations, mid-tier pricing.

must_attend.name: INBOUND 2025 - HubSpot's Marketing & Sales Conference
must_attend.tagline: Connects business, marketing, and sales leaders for networking and workshops
must_attend.why_relevant: Large marketing conference blending sales and marketing, huge networking potential, relevant to mid to senior professionals and investors, mid-tier to premium.

should_attend.name: The AI Conference™ 2025
should_attend.tagline: Covers AGI, LLMs, infrastructure, startups, real-world AI applications
should_attend.why_relevant: Comprehensive AI conference with global reach, good for investors and professionals interested in AI developments, mid-tier to premium pricing.

should_attend.name: THE Global AI Summit 2025
should_attend.tagline: Explores AI challenges and advancements with leaders and academics
should_attend.why_relevant: Strong AI summit with industry leaders, good networking, mid-tier to premium pricing, relevant for investors.

should_attend.name: Digital & Social Marketing Conference | #DMWF Expo North America
should_attend.tagline: Strategic content and insights on digital marketing and social media trends
should_attend.why_relevant: Focused on digital marketing with good size audience, relevant for marketing investors, mid-tier cost, moderate networking.

should_attend.name: Digital Summit Series
should_attend.tagline: Digital marketing tactics and trends with workshops and networking
should_attend.why_relevant: Good for targeted marketing tactics, moderate audience size, good networking for marketers but lower investor focus, mid-tier cost.

should_attend.name: Third International Conference on Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning (AIM-2026)
should_attend.tagline: International platform for AI and ML experts to present, network, and collaborate
should_attend.why_relevant: Comprehensive AI/ML conference with good networking potential, mid-tier to premium cost, valuable for investors focused on AI industry.

nice_to_attend.name: 2025 Conference on Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, and Business Analytics
nice_to_attend.tagline: Impact of AI/ML, Metaverse, bots, 5G, AR/VR on business analytics
nice_to_attend.location: Columbia Business School, New York, USA
nice_to_attend.why_relevant: Combines AI/ML with business analytics, smaller academic/business focus, ticket price unknown, moderate ROI potential for investors.

nice_to_attend.name: AI+Science 2025 Conference
nice_to_attend.tagline: Focus on AI and scientific research intersection
nice_to_attend.why_relevant: More academic/research focused, less investor presence, smaller but relevant niche, ticket price unknown.

nice_to_attend.name: World Social Marketing Conference Alicante 2025
nice_to_attend.tagline: Social marketing and behavior change disciplines
nice_to_attend.why_relevant: Global social marketing niche, smaller scale but useful for networking and learning social marketing trends.

nice_to_attend.name: 2025 ANA Masters of Marketing Conference
nice_to_attend.tagline: Marketing thought leadership on brand growth and innovation
nice_to_attend.why_relevant: High-level marketing leadership, good for networking but cost is premium with uncertain dates, good ROI.

nice_to_attend.name: Forty-Second International Conference on Machine Learning (ICML 2025)
nice_to_attend.tagline: Top machine learning global conference with workshops and networking
nice_to_attend.why_relevant: Strong technical AI/ML focus, good for researchers and investors, priced mid-tier with large attendance.
